headline: Air Products Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of Air Products (NYSE:APD) today declared a quarterly dividend of $1.79 per share of common stock. The dividend is payable on November 10, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on October 1, 2025.
